column4: how do i access the shared folder of a virtual box guest system?
apt-get instakll is for the linux os not the windows
besides there has to be a simplier way
you want windows in vb to to access shared folder on ubuntu?
yeah i want the windows VB to access a folder on ubuntu
to put files from the vb onto the physical hard drives
the way i did it was shared a folder on ubuntu using command shares-admin
where do i use that command and whats the full command syntax
actually you jst type shares-admin and click unlock
where do i type that? the linux or windows cli?
i get an eror after installing the services. something about maximum number of connections reached'
ok i fixed that but i cant unlock it. authentication failure. and when i run it with sudo i can press unlock at all
on the sudo. i see no password spot without sudo
i type this password alot man i know how to enter it correctly
